name: Darn Tough O Canada Over-the-Calf Light Cushion Ski Socks - Women's
categories: O Canada Over-the-Calf Light Cushion Ski Sock
description: Celebrate your home and native land every time you head to the ski hill. Fine-gauge merino wool provides warmth without bulk and has natural antimicrobial properties.Made of high-density knit merino wool with nylon and spandex for durability and fit.All weather performance: Warm in winter, cool enough for spring turns.True seamless construction makes them irresistibly comfortable.Light cushioning underfoot for comfort in ski boots.Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep.
